long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Ad Reaction Timer: Turn Ad Skipping into a Competition! 🎮

Ever wondered how quick you are at skipping YouTube ads? Now you can find out and compete with others! YouTube Ad Reaction Timer transforms the mundane task of skipping ads into an exciting competition.

What it Does:
- Precisely measures your reaction time when skipping YouTube ads
- Tracks your personal best times
- Shows your global ranking among other ad-skippers
- Features a live leaderboard of the fastest ad-skippers worldwide
- Completely free and privacy-focused

Why Install:
✨ Make Ads Fun: Transform waiting for the skip button into an engaging reaction-time game
🏆 Compete Globally: See how your skip-speed ranks against users worldwide
📊 Track Progress: Monitor your reaction times and watch yourself improve
🎯 Challenge Friends: Share your ranking and compete with friends for the fastest skip time

How it Works:
- Install the extension, visit our website (https://ytskip.whyismynamerudy.tech/) and sign in with Google
- Watch YouTube as normal
- When an ad appears, try to click the skip button as fast as possible
- Your reaction time is automatically measured and recorded
- Check the leaderboard to see your global ranking

Perfect for:
- Competitive gamers looking to test their reflexes
- YouTube power users who want to make ad-skipping more engaging
- Anyone curious about their reaction time
- Friends who love friendly competition

Join thousands of users already competing for the fastest skip times! Install now and turn every YouTube ad into an opportunity to climb the global leaderboard. 🚀

Privacy Note: We only track skip-button reaction times. No personal data or browsing history is collected.
